item.title: Configure Tailscale DNS on Qubes OS
item.description: This post goes over configuring Tailscale DNS to support DNS resolution from other AppVMs using the Tailscale VM. This guide assumes you already have Tailscale configured in a TemplateVM and a sys-tailscale AppVM is running Tailscaled for other AppVMs to use. If you don’t have Tailscale already configured, then please head over to taradiddles’ excellent guide over on the Qubes forum. We need to do the following on the TemplateVM to get it all configured:
